page.title: 03HOUSING IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: In Paxford area the houses,which are mostly stone built,range in size from large manors to small cottages.They vary in age and many older properties have been modernised.The majority of houses are privately owned.Planning plays a large part in housing policy in this area of special beauty where many people wish to settle.Many older houses are thatched and newer ones are well built with reconstituted stone. There are 53 council houses,brick and tiled and a few roughcast.Paxford area has 7 large farmhouses,10 bungalows, some of which are now used as holiday homes.There are 6 caravans situated on a farm.2 cottages in Paxford need restoration.
